value:
Benefits from Bonus Heroes:
Whenever you defeat a foe using
a bonus Hero, you will earn extra
points toward your score.

The Shield battle in Mjölnir's
Strike is on! Protect Midgard's
Shield from the oncoming foes!

If you battle now, you can receive
rewards after the event ends.

The Counter battle in Mjölnir's
Strike is on! Work together with
fellow players to defeat your foes!

If you battle now, you can receive
rewards after the event ends.

Used in Mjölnir's Strike to build and improve
your structures for Midgard's Shield.
A scrap of paper with otherworldly power.

Used to participate in Counter battles
in Mjölnir's Strike.

Structure would have no effect,
so it cannot be activated now.
Place for +4 to every ally's stats!

Mjölnir's Strike rewards from the
previous season can be claimed
after that season's results have
been calculated, before the
following season ends.
The next phase will begin soon.

The results will not be counted if the battle
lasts past the end of the next phase.

The next phase has begun. You can't
battle at this time.
You can always join the battle next season!

Because the phase changed, the
results were not counted.
Return to the Mjölnir's Strike menu.
Return to the Mjölnir's Strike menu.

Test Defenses battles will not add
points to your score.

Structures defensive teams use for support.

If deployed in a Shield battle in Mjölnir's Strike,
unit will not be attacked by foes.

$aIf deployed in a Shield battle in Mjölnir's Strike,
unit will be granted Spd+$a0.

$aIf deployed in a Shield battle in Mjölnir's Strike,
unit will be granted Def+$a0.

$aIf deployed in a Shield battle in Mjölnir's Strike,
unit will be granted Res+$a0.

$a・ When $a0-type Mythic Heroes are
deployed in Mjölnir's Strike Shield battles, they
are granted +4 to their HP and stats.

$a・ When $a0-type Mythic Heroes are
deployed in Mjölnir's Strike Shield battles, they
are granted +2 to their HP and stats.

Midgard's Shield is Thórr's target.
Don't let your Gateways fall!

Defending Midgard's Shield:
Place Shield-exclusive structures
and allies to fortify the Shield.

Using Mechanism Structures:
During battle, tap a mechanism,
and then tap the activation button
on the lower part of the screen to
activate its special effect.

Afterward, the effect will refresh
after a certain number of turns.

Permanent Structures:
Your key structures, Gateways,
cannot be removed.

Structure Destruction:
Gateways can be destroyed
with a single attack. Mechanisms
cannot be destroyed.

Auto Setup:
You can use this function to both
automatically build, place, and
improve structures, as well as
create and place teams.
Note: Midgard Gems will be used
as necessary to build or improve
your structures.

Test Defenses:
Test your map's defenses and
your team's mettle.

Edit Mjölnir's Strike Team:
Up to four ally Pair Up units can
be formed for Mjölnir's Strike.

Allies paired up for Mjölnir's
Strike will not receive stat boosts
from their partner, but if the lead
is defeated, the cohort will remain.

Team Lock:
All members' current levels, stats,
skills, Sacred Seals, and blessings
will be locked, but only in the
Mjölnir's Strike battles. Unlocking
the team will allow any changes to
the units to be reflected.

The Four Roles:
Teams are made up of four roles.

Atk roles move within the top 3
map rows and are not attacked
by foes.

Spd roles gain Spd+10 and move
within the bottom 5 map rows.

Def roles gain Def+10 and move
within the bottom 5 map rows.

Res roles gain Res+10 and move
within the bottom 5 map rows.

Bonus Seasons:
Mythic Heroes deployed during
their bonus season are granted
one of two bonuses:

Major: +4 to HP and all stats
Minor: +2 to HP and all stats

Mythic Hero Score Boost:
The level of Mythic Heroes
deployed in their bonus season
will be treated as if they have
additional merges. (Major, +10
merges; Minor, +5 merges.)

Then, stronger foes will appear,
offering higher potential scores.

More Information:
Legendary and Mythic Effects
that boost blessed allies do not
activate in Mjölnir's Strike.

EXP, SP, HM, etc. will not be
earned for Mjölnir's Strike.

Place/Remove Structures:
Place or remove the structures
that you've finished building.

Structure Limit:
You can place only a certain
number of each type of structure.

How to Use Mechanisms:
・ In battle, select a mechanism
structure by tapping on it.
↓
・ Tap on the activation button in
the lower part of the screen.

Build Structures:
Use Midgard Gems to build new
structures.

Improve Structures:
Use Midgard Gems to improve
structures by one level.

How to Use Mechanisms:
・ In battle, select a mechanism
structure by tapping on it.
↓
・ Tap on the activation button in
the lower part of the screen.

Flow of Mjölnir's Strike:
1. Brace phase. Ready defenses
and edit Midgard's Shield.
2. Shield phase. Weather the foe's
onslaught to gain offensive power.
3. Counter phase. Deal damage to
the foe using your gained power.
Deal more than you take to win!

Brace Phase:
This is when battle preparations
take place.

Build/improve structures and
place allies on the map via the
Edit Shield Map screen.

Shield Phase:
Weather the onslaught. Last for
seven turns to claim victory. Try
as many times as you want.

Losing an ally or Gateway lowers
your score. If both Gateways fall,
you lose the battle.

Strength of Thórr's Forces:
Foe strength is based on Tier,
difficulty, and the strength of the
Heroes on your defensive team.

The strength of a Pair Up unit in
Mjölnir's Strike is determined by
the stronger of the two Heroes.

Score:
Your score will be based on the
strength of your defeated foes.

Rewards:
After the event, you earn rewards
based on your Tier. High scores
can lead to a Tier promotion.

Bonus Seasons:
Mythic Heroes deployed during
their bonus season are granted
one of two bonuses:

Major: +4 to HP and all stats
Minor: +2 to HP and all stats

Mythic Hero Score Boost:
The level of Mythic Heroes
deployed in their bonus season
will be treated as if they have
additional merges. (Major, +10
merges; Minor, +5 merges.)

Then, stronger foes will appear,
offering higher potential scores.

Bonus Structure:
When placed, all deployed allies
are granted Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4.
(This will not affect your foe's
strength or score value.)

Counter Phase:
All players join forces to protect
the Kingdom of Askr, battling back
against Thórr's forces.

Victory Condition:
If Askr's forces deal more damage
than Thórr's forces before time
runs out, Askr will be declared
the winner!

Countering:
Use Counter Arrows to Counter.
Your offensive power increases
based on how many you use. (Any
left unused do not carry over.)

Offensive Power:
Based on Tier and Shield score.

Weaker Bonus:
When weaker than your foes, your
offensive power is multiplied by 3.

Combo Bonus:
Based on the number of Counter
Arrows used across all players in
the hour prior. (Details follow.)

Create combos to increase the
overall damage dealt every hour!
1,000+ combo: ×1.1 bonus
2,000+ combo: ×1.2 bonus
3,000+ combo: ×1.3 bonus
4,000+ combo: ×1.4 bonus
5,000+ combo: ×1.5 bonus

Askr Level:
・ Increases by 1 when you win.
If your force was stronger than
your foe's for a total of ten hours
or more, increases by 2 instead.
・ Decreases by 1 when you lose.
・ The higher the Askr Level, the
better the rewards.

Check Rewards:
You can check the current
rewards.

Rank:
This is your current rank.
Note that it may take time
for updated placement
information to be reflected.

Your Rank and Top Players:
These options show player
rankings for the current event.

Friends:
Shows your friends' rankings for
the current event's Shield battle.
Higher score means higher rank.

Select Edit Shield Map and get
ready for a defensive battle.

Allies in the upper part of the map
will not be attacked by foes.

Build mechanisms to protect your
Gateways from Thórr's forces!

First, build mechanism structures
on the Shield map.

$aYou can use Midgard Gems to
build and improve structures.

For now, why not create
a $a0!

A mechanism structure has
been created.

Structures that have already been
created can be placed or removed
using the Place/Remove menu.

Structures can be moved in the
same way as allies.

Move a mechanism to a new
position on the map.

Using Mechanism Structures:
During battle, tap a mechanism,
and then tap the activation button
on the lower part of the screen to
activate its special effect.

Afterward, the effect will refresh
after a certain number of turns.

Fortify your Shield map and then
defend it to earn rewards that
can further bolster your position!

Auto Setup can edit your Shield
map for you.

Use the left and right arrows to
change the placement theme.

Cannot be removed during the
tutorial.

The battle will be lost if your foe destroys
all of your Gateways.

The battle will be lost if your foe destroys
all of your Gateways.

$aDeals $a0 damage to foes within 9 rows
and 3 columns centered on structure.

$aRestores $a0 HP to allies within 5 rows
and 5 columns centered on structure.

$aRestricts movement to 1 space on any foe in
the same column as structure with HP ≤ $a0
through that foe's next action.

$aPrevents counterattacks from any foe within
9 rows and 3 columns centered on structure
with HP ≤ $a0 through that foe's next action.

$aInflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-$a0 on foes within
9 rows and 3 columns centered on structure
through their next actions.

Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during
combat = current bonus on each of ally's
stats to allies within 3 rows and 3 columns
centered on structure. Calculates each stat
bonus independently. (That turn only.)

Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during
combat = current bonus on each of ally's
stats to allies within 2 spaces of structure.
Calculates each stat bonus independently.
(That turn only.)

Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during
combat = current bonus on each of ally's
stats to allies within 5 rows and 5 columns
centered on structure. Calculates each stat
bonus independently. (That turn only.)

Allies within 3 rows and 3 columns centered on
structure can move 1 extra space. (That turn
only. Does not stack.)

Allies within 2 spaces of structure can move
1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

Allies within 5 rows and 5 columns centered
on structure can move 1 extra space. (That
turn only. Does not stack.)

$aGrants Special cooldown count-$a0 to
allies within 5 rows and 5 columns centered
on structure.

$aGrants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+$a0 to allies within
5 rows and 5 columns centered on structure.

$aPushes any foe within 9 rows and 3 columns
centered on structure with HP ≤ $a0 back
by 2 spaces, toward the top of the map.
Select the seal you want to equip.

Exchange a Sacred Seal equipped on
this ally with that of another ally.

Target ally cannot equip the Sacred
Seal to be exchanged from the source
ally, so it will be left unequipped.

Any Sacred Seals currently equipped
on other allies will be removed.

Lock this team?

All team members' current levels,
stats, skills, Sacred Seals, and
blessings will be locked, but only
for Mjölnir's Strike battles.

Unlock this team?

All team members' stats and
equipment will reflect the most
recent changes.
A defensive team has not been set.
